output.sentences: last night was our family reunion, we where at the bar waiting for the late arrivals.
WE al where sitting around a large table enjoying our meal and catching up on our lives.
We had a plate of fresh lemon wedges since our traditional drink is Tequila.
We all had a wonderful time eating and enjoying each others company.
Some of our guests came with a tractor it was a huge success
